attributes.action: Ensure Article 50 is not revoked without parliament voting on a referendum
attributes.background: There is a risk that revoking Article 50 may become the only logical remaining option that complies with the will of the UK as expressed through its parliamentary representatives. It would seem most democratic to determine the current will of the People on the subject before taking this step.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

We aren't sure whether you want a referendum or Parliament to vote on a referendum.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235138
